answers.answer: Burning in the pads of your feet can be an early indication of neuropothy and this is linked to diabetes.  Suggest you talk to your doctor about having your blood sugar tested (fasting and non-fasting).

question: I am desperate to know why the pads of my feet burn and are very sensitive. Also why my whole body's skin is so sensitive. I have recently broken my humerous and the my circulation is not working properly until I start therapy - could this be the reason ???Thankyou.
